name: Shop Battle
description:
A colorful game in the style of .io for children and adults. Start playing in the store, and end up in a mall in the entertainment room for teens with a lot of console video games.
Each hit in the target will bring you money for which you will buy new projectiles with a large income and at the same time you can pump the power of the throw to open new locations.

All the similarities with the characters and objects in the game are random and the authorship belongs exclusively to the authors of the game!
Have a nice game!
